posts.post_content:
This is a cool card that I know will be appreciated here.   I listed this card on the BST last year, but still own it.  New year, new collectors, new eyes, another Chance.

Bright orange background, clean Hindu reverse, PSA-5. Hopefully the scans speak for themselves.

Similar examples have sold for $4k-$5k over the last few years.  I have owned this specific card for approximately 15years, bought it raw.

I am looking to sell this card but am having a hard time letting it go. No rush to sell, but I'm no longer a serious T206 collector and it seems like this card deserves to be in someone else's collection at this point.  Looking to get around $4k.  Please make me an offer I can't refuse, thanks.

Happy Collecting,
Craig

Craig,

Very nice card!   Had I not gotten burnt to a crisp on buying and later selling a PSA 6 Hindu Matty, I would have been seriously interested.  Nonetheless, it's a really nice example that deserves attention.

Best,
Scott
Consign this card to Goodwin, you'll get some dumbass to bid $20,000 ;)
